column4: Getting "SystemError: installArchives() failed" when trying to install Nvidia drivers on Karmic...
from Hardware Drivers or are you using the installer from Nvidia site?
ZykotickK9 - from both jockey-gtk and jockey-text.
my initial google search suggests you might want to use an older version of driver, what version are you currently installing?
ZykotickK9 - happens with any driver I try to install - 173,185,190 or 195.
what gfx card do you have "lspci | grep -i vga" to find out specifically
ZykotickK9, Geforce 9300 on a Mini-ITX board.
The Nvidia binary drivers have previously always worked on this machine.  Just uninstalled 195 to go to 185 to see if I could resolve some screen tearing...
But after I uninstalled 195 using jockey, I get that error when trying to install 185.
so they were working before the update?
ummm, that complicates matters -- i really don't know what to suggest...
It appears to be an issue with jockey, but uninstalling/reinstalling that does not resolve the issue.
have you tried "sudo apt-get install nvidia-glx-185" ?
and thanks for correcting my nic - highlighting makes a big difference
